Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes and noncontrolling interest
Net Income: net income loss available to common stockholders

Interest Income: interest and fee income loans and leases
Other Income (Expense): debt and equity securities gain loss
gain loss on sale of securities net
gain loss on sale of stock in subsidiary or equity method investee
gain loss on shares exchange program

Other Operating Expenses: financing receivable credit loss and off balance sheet credit loss liability expense recovery
other than temporary impairment losses investments portion recognized in earnings net

Other Comprehensive Income: other than temporary impairment losses investments portion in other comprehensive income loss before tax including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share
Diluted EPS: income loss from continuing operations per diluted share
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

Total Revenues: investment advisory management and administrative fees

__unmapped__: discontinued operation income loss from discontinued operation before income tax
discontinued operation tax effect of discontinued operation
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax attributable to reporting entity
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax per basic share
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax per diluted share
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
preferred stock discount accretion and redemptions
preferred stock dividends income statement impact
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes and noncontrolling interests
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
